subSections.title: Derived characters
subSections.text: * {{l|mul|[[𭍑]]<!-- 𭈄 is a Sawndip (Zhuang) character -->, [[𥸠]]<!-- 𥮋 is a Vietnamese character -->}}

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*sri||to exist}} ({{zh-ref|Benedict, 1976}}); cognate with {{cog|tbq-pro|*s-ri(t)}}, whence {{cog|bo|tr=srid.pa}} and {{cog|my|ရှိ||to be, to exist}}. 

{{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} derives {{cog|sit-pro|*s-riŋ ~ s-r(j)aŋ||live, alive, green, raw}} from this root, yet points out that {{och-l|生}}'s initial '''*sr-''' cluster was retained instead of becoming voiceless /r̥/ as in {{och-l|體}}, possibly owing to re-analysis of '''*s-''' as a causative prefix.
